title: Why does my league never open every week?
body: Every week I have to reinstall league because it won't open **EVERY** Saturday. I find this very annoying because the download time for league is quite long and I wanna find a way to fix this.

replies.body:
Being unable to launch League every Saturday is very peculiar, and I'd like to help get this resolved for you.  I'm curious if your computer runs a process or scan every Saturday that might be preventing access to the game.  Just in case, as a first step I'd recommend going through the steps in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to determine if your OS is blocking access to game files.

If your issue persists, any additional information you might be able to provide here can help find what's going wrong and work towards a resolution.  I look forward to your reply and helping if I can!
